The video was originally published by th: 2. The video was repurposed by propagandists and shared as if it captured a group of people attempting to "stage" fake wounds and injuries to deceive the public about atrocities in Israel or Syria.
Facebook pages such as: Citizens Against the Reality of Terrorism" and "The Palestinian Lie" labeled the footage as a "fraud" and claimed that the makeup artist was trying to make their oppression more believable and deceive everyone.
Evidence from the video: such as people wearing shirts for a "special effect make-up" outfit and openly speaking with news channels about their work, contradicts the claims made by those who labeled it as a deception.
